reviewText: I love watching this for NaNoWriMo! It gets me inspired for the month and I don't feel bad when I'm not writing! Keep up the great work! XD

Although there weren't as many special features on this DVD as there were for the first season, I am so glad to own this series. The second season of Month of the Novel was even better than the first. I love the sci-fi, the characters and the new challenges for Writer.
Will there be a third season? I hope so.
